title: The Aura
body:
Take a look around. Do you not see that there is more to life... more to your world than the single plane of your birth? You have always pushed forward with your desires without regard to what *may* be... and now you have the <ahem> reward for that. Stop. Observe. Find the spark of what can be floating amongst the smoking ruins of what is. Embrace the subtle arts.
	Many watch for a powerful icon to bring knowledge... but knowledge exists in fragments that must be hunted and arranged to form the root of power.
